title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set a default value in the list box of a report parameter.
2. Modify the default value.
3. Save the changes.
4. Open the report parameter again.

OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB:
Change the Display type to Combo Box.

Expected result: The default value 'aaa' should be retained after modifying it. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.

Actual result: No default value is set even after modifying it. After step 5, the OK button can still be used.
